TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit StructureChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class StructureChangedEventArgs Inherits AutomationEventArgs

summary.span: UI Automation 트리 구조가 변경될 때 발생하는 이벤트에 대한 정보를 포함합니다.

span.span: Contains information about the event that is raised when the UI Automation tree structure has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType structureChangeType, int32[] runtimeId) cil managed

span.span: A single value that specifies the type of change.
The runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.

summary.span: 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화하고 구조가 변경된 요소의 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] 및 변경의 유형을 지정합니다.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the type of change and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the element whose structure changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 반환 될 수 있는 값 `structureChangeType` UI 자동화 공급자 구현에 따라 달라 집니다.The values that can be returned in `structureChangeType` depend on the implementation of the UI Automation provider. 예를 들어 경우 항목은 추가 하거나 제거할를 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] 지정할 수는 공급자를 추가 또는 제거 항목 수를 확인할 수 없는 경우 목록 상자에 아니라 또는 합니다.For example, when items are added to or removed from a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] list box, if the provider is not able to determine the number of items added or removed, it might specify and not or . 다음 표에서 정보를 수신한 경우에 다른 구조 변경 사항에 대 한 합니다.The following table describes the information in the event received by the for different structure changes. |`structureChangeType`|이벤트 원본Event source|`runtimeId`| |---------------------------|------------------|-----------------| ||추가된 자식입니다.The child that was added.|추가된 자식입니다.The child that was added.| ||부모 제거 된 자식입니다.The parent of the child that was removed.|제거된 자식입니다.The child that was removed.| ||추가 된 자식의 부모를 지정 합니다.The parent of the children that were added.|추가 된 자식의 부모를 지정 합니다.The parent of the children that were added.| ||부모 제거 된 자식입니다.The parent of the children that were removed.|부모 제거 된 자식입니다.The parent of the children that were removed.| ||부모 무효화 된 자식입니다.The parent of the children that were invalidated.|무효화 된 자식의 부모The parent of the children that were invalidated| 사용자 지정 컨트롤에 의미 있는 값을 제공할 못할 `runtimeId`합니다.Custom controls might not be able to provide a meaningful value in `runtimeId`. 자세한 내용은 을 참조하세요.For more information, see . ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 생성 하 고 자식으로 추가 되 면 이벤트를 발생 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다 또는 사용자 지정 목록 상자에서 제거 합니다.The following example shows how to construct and raise an event when children are added to, or removed from, a custom list box. [!code-csharp[FragmentProvider#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FragmentProvider/CSharp/ListFragment.cs#101)] [!code-vb[FragmentProvider#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FragmentProvider/VisualBasic/ListFragment.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32[] GetRuntimeId() cil managed

summary.span: 검색 된 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 런타임 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] 의 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 구조가 변경 된 요소입니다.

span.span: Retrieves the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.
The runtime ID of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element whose structure changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 반환 값을 추가 또는 제거 하는 자식 또는 자식의 수를 지정 하는 경우에 식별자를 추가, 제거 되거나 무효화의 부모 식별자 수 있습니다.The return value may be the identifier of the child that was added or removed or, in the case of many children being added, removed, or invalidated, the identifier of the parent. 자세한 내용은 을 참조하세요.For more information, see . 사용자 지정 컨트롤 유효한 런타임 식별자를 제공 하지 않을 수 있습니다.Custom controls might not provide a valid runtime identifier.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StructureChangeType As StructureChangeType

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 발생 한 변경 형식을 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다는 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 트리 구조입니다.

span.span: Gets a value indicating the type of change that occurred in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree structure.

value.span: 형식을 변경 하는 오류가 발생 했습니다.

span.span: The type of changed that occurred.
